channel.title: "Electricity Gone" Moment
channel.description: This morning while I was preparing for a customer demo that I'll be doing over LiveMeeting later today, my DSL connection stopped working.  I have a reasonably complicated home office network arrangement - but it is most often my VPN...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Paul Roub+00:00
item.description: Heh. I do every one of those same things, and when my net connection is down I seem unable to retain that fact for more than a few minutes at a time. The number of times I've started to load my ISP's site to check for status reports...
item.dc:creator: Paul Roub
